ing.item: 1.2-oz Baby Ruth candy bars; cut in small pieces

directions.step:
Blend flour with salt and soda in small bowl. Gradually add sugar to butter in mixing bowl; cream until light and fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well. Blend in dry ingredients gradually; mix thoroughly. Stir in candy pieces. Chill dough for easy handling. Drop by tablespoons onto lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 375Â° for 10 to 12 minutes until golden brown.
